name: Double Ewe
description:
Play as a sheep that keeps dying and being cloned. When you die, you respawn as well as a clone of you which repeats whatever you just did until it dies.

Controls:

Esc - Quit game

Arrow Keys - Move

Credits:
- Andy (Code)
- colleenekat (Art)
- Shannon Zagst(Art)
- Jim O'Brien (Music)
- Dave Mayza (Particle System/Effects)
